name: Tank Wars (itch) (JarrodSevior)
description:
Overview:

This is a small tank game i used as practice for my introduction to coding games in Unity3D. It requires two players and two 360 controllers to play.

Players: 2

Controls: XBOX 360 Controller

            Left Joystick - Move and Rotate Tank

            Right Joystick - Aim Tank Turret

            Right Trigger - Shoot
